description:
while testing scalability for  Openstack found that rabbitmq connections not getting increased beyond 662 or 831.

Observations are,

Each CN will make 5 to 6 connection to the controller.
when I connect around 150 CN's to the controller, the connection not proportional  to number of CN, and always it limited with 831

Because of these issue agents were going unstable state and its not scaling beyond 80 CN's.
title: ICE-HOUSE-GA:rabbitmq connections not getting increased beyond 662 in scalability setup with 138 CN connected to controller.
